items.title: S&P 500's breakout May was largely a result of Mag 7 gains
items.description: The S&P 500 (^GSPC) clocked its best month of trading in May since 1990, and the majority of the Magnificent Seven — comprised of tech stocks Meta Platforms (META), Microsoft (MSFT), Alphabet (GOOGL, GOOG), Amazon (AMZN), Apple (AAPL), Nvidia (NVDA), Tesla (TSLA) — may be deserving of some of the credit. Yahoo Finance host Julie Hyman recaps the Mag 7 stock gains and how it contributed to the S&P 500's breakout May. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

items.title: Commentary: Why businesses want to blame Trump for price hikes
items.description: Businesses suffer when customers blame them for price hikes. That's why they're willing to call out Trump's tariffs as the cause.

items.title: Amazon set to expand robotics push to cut labor reliance
items.description: Investing.com -- Amazon.com is accelerating its robotics rollout across its fulfillment and delivery operations, a move Bank of America says could unlock up to $16 billion in annual cost savings by 2032 and significantly reduce the company’s labor dependence.

items.title: Amazon (AMZN) Target Lifted to $248 by BofA on AI, Robotics Momentum
items.description: Wall Street Backs Amazon's AI Shift, Price Target Raised to $248

items.title: Amazon Expands Robotics, AI to Cut Costs, Boost Retail Edge, BofA Says
items.description: Amazon.com (AMZN) is expanding its use of robots and artificial intelligence, projecting "billions"
